articles.title: ‘Rohit Sharma walked the talk in World Cup': Surya wants to replicate captain - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav will lead India in the five-match T20I series against Australia and wants to replicate what Rohit Sharma did as a leader in the World Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: It may have been only three days post since India's heartbreaking defeat in the final of the World Cup 2023, but significant developments have already unfolded for Suryakumar Yadav, who, at 33 years … [+2757 chars]

articles.author: Amar Pal Singh Bhalla
articles.title: David Warner discloses Australia's reason to bat second in the CWC 2023 final against India - Cricket Times
articles.description: Australia's David Warner has revealed the rationale behind opting to bat second against India in final of the ODI World Cup 2023. Australia eventually clinched the title for a historic sixth time.
articles.content: Australia‘s triumphant performance in the ICC ODI World Cup 2023 final against India was accentuated by a strategic move that raised eyebrows which was Pat Cummins‘ decision to bowl first. Despite th… [+1829 chars]
